name: Ballimals
summary:
A two dimensional, local-multiplayer, fighting, platformer where you battle against up to four of your friends to push them out into the void and claim the throne as the one and only Sling Master. 
 
In Sling Heroes you play as a selection of ball-shaped animal whose main source of movement is swinging back and forth with a sling. All characters share two basic moves, but have one special ability exclusive only to that character.
